actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1991 to apply the National Labor Relations Act, the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, and the Occupational Safety Act of 1970 to Congress, and for other purposes.
short_title: Government Employee Labor Rights Act of 1992
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Government Employee Labor Rights Act of 1992 - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1991 (Public Law 102-166) to apply specified provisions of the National Labor Relations Act, the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, and the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to employees of the Senate, the House of Representatives, and instrumentalities of the Congress.

titles.title: Government Employee Labor Rights Act of 1992

A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1991 to apply the National Labor Relations Act, the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938, and the Occupational Safety Act of 1970 to Congress, and for other purposes.
